_description: The Despised Nun: a Narratio in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Basyl telleþ soþfastlyÞat in a lond was a
                    Nonneri…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…God ȝiue vs grace hit clene to bringeTo heuene riche
                    þer crist is kyng. Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Of a nonne þat feynede heore self a foul (f.
                    212vb)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.
BodEngPoeta1.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Die Evangelien-Geschichten der Homiliensammlung des Ms. Vernon.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         57 (1877): 241-316: 308.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
Seynt Basyl telles sothfastlyÞat in a lande was a
                    nonnery…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…God graunte vs grace it clene to bryngTil heuen blisse at
                    oure endyng
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title: A Tale (added to margin by a modern hand, p. 337)

CULDd11.First Lines:
SEynt Basil telliþ soþfastliÞat in a lond was a
                    nonneri…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…God graunte vs grace it clene to bringeto heuene blisse at
                    oure endinge
CULDd11.Attributed Title: Narracio (added to right margin by a later hand, f. 204)

BLHar2391.First Lines: Saynt basyle tells vs sekirlyþat in a land was a nunry…
BLHar2391.Last Lines: …god lene vs grace in owr werkyngWele to lyf & to heuen vs bryng
BLHar2391.Attributed Title: Dominica xxi (left margin, f. 222v) with “A tale” written below

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Saynte basyll tels soith fastlyþat in a lande was a
                    Nunry…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…God gyfe vs grace ytt clene to bryngTyll heuene ryke þar
                    criste es kyng

HunHM129.First Lines:
Seint basill tellyth sothfastlyÞat in a land wos a
                    nunry…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…Amen I rede we all syngffor off þat ioy is none
                    endyng
